content.prompt: Which of the following developments most directly related to the increased sectional strife immediately prior to the election of 1860?

choices.label: The addition of territory to the United States through the annexation of California
The rise of nativist political groups in Northern urban areas
The differing viewpoints over the use of the tariff to protect domestic industry
The legal ruling that denied African Americans rights of citizenship

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
